name: ココロクローバー パート１/Kokoro Clover Part1
name_original: ココロクローバー パート１/Kokoro Clover Part1
description:
Join the Spirit Summoner, Treffy, in this side-scrolling action-platformer in the style of a Sunday morning anime TV show. In part 1, Treffy begins her story with Spirit friends and some clumsy bad guys. Fight using magic and transform using Elemental Spirits in this exciting and comedic adventure!

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
（machine translation）

Kokoro Clover Part 1" is the first installment of the "Kokoro Clover" series, a casual side-scrolling dot picture action game based on the theme of "casual play" and "Sunday morning anime", in which the main character, Treffy, is transformed, summoned, dances (with unique motions), and has a choice of stages.

Assist, dance, and collect unleashed assists, dances, and collections while completing the story mode and challenge mode inspired by the atmosphere of "Sunday Morning Anime.
The game is unique in that it opens up.

The protagonist and player, Treffy the Spirit Master, has to use the help of his fellow spirits in the stage. Transformation, which allows you to change your appearance and attributes, and Assist, which summons fellow spirits and defeated bosses. You can "Dance" to perform unique motions set on the spot.
These elements will be opened up as you watch the story and clear stages.

In addition, there are treasure chests in the stages, and you can "collect" the stickers hidden in them.
Collected collections can be viewed in Library Mode.

In the Story Mode, Treffy, a spirit user, obtains a mysterious clover and is able to use it to help him get to the next level. embark on a journey
The storyline is based on the image of an animated film (30 minutes) depicting the situation.
You can also select the tutorial map and boss battles.

In the "Challenge Mode", you can select the stage where the bosses will be waiting for you at the end of the game.
Defeat all bosses (including Story Mode bosses) and fight against them in succession to unlock the boss rush! You can also use the Library mode.

In the Library mode, you can also use the collections you've collected in each stage and the progress of the story. character and
You can see a description of the monster with a dot picture.

In "Password Mode", you can choose a password to unlock special assists and dances. You can do this.
The password can be found at the end of the story mode and challenge mode.

Kokoro Clover was created with the themes of "casual play" and "Japanese Sunday morning anime". I did.
Experience the lively and fun atmosphere of pixel art.

Play time: 40 minutes to 1 hour
